wikipedia_page.main: Simon Combes (1940 – 12 December 2004) was an artist born in Shaftesbury, England.  Residing most of his life in Kenya, Combes was well known for his paintings of African wildlife and dedication to conservation.In February 2005, the Artists For Conservation organization created a conservation award in the artist's honor.

response: Winston Churchill picnickedW Churchill, My Travels in Africa by the lake in 1908 after some pig sticking, Evelyn Waugh stayed for a spot of "corridor creeping" in the 1930s.  Jomo Kenyatta came for a small picnic (only 300 dancers) in 1978 (shortly before his death), and Prince Amyn Aga Khan came for lunch in 2001. Part of Tomb Raider 3 was filmed on the northern lakeshore and Simon Combes grew up there and returned later to live there.

In 2013 Hodges was recognised in a show at Nature in Art "Wildlife Masters" where he was the only pencil artist exhibited with painters David Shepherd, Simon Combes, Anthony Gibbs and sculptor Geoffrey Dashwood.
*Simon Combes, 64, British wildlife artist, gored by a buffalo.
